Articles.Content: Just thought I'd show this to you guys, I've been neglecting Duna for quite some time now, and I managed to get there, but with no way to return, thanks to my chutes ripping apart my return stage. But anyway, got a nice screenie!
Look on the bright side- this is the perfect opportunity to learn how to do an interplanetary rescue mission!
I wish I could do so... what does it take? How big of a ship?
